Uses of Class
jtxt.emulator.Location

  • Packages that use Location 
    Package Description
    jtxt  
    jtxt.emulator  
    jtxt.emulator.tui  

    • Uses of Location in jtxt

      Methods in jtxt with parameters of type Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Glyph GlyphBuffer.getGlyph(Location location)
      Returns the glyph which occupies the given location.
      void GlyphBuffer.update(Glyph glyph, Location... locations)
      Updates the each of the Locations within this buffer so that they contain the given glyph.
      void GlyphBuffer.update(Glyph glyph, Location location)
      Updates the character at the specified index.
      void GlyphBuffer.update(GString[] lines, Location start)
      For each GString in the array, this method updates the frame at the start location, starting at the given line and incrementing by one for each subsequent element in the array, and retaining the position for all lines added to the buffer.
      void GlyphBuffer.update(GString glyphs, Location start)
      Starting at the given Location, this method will will replace the glyphs from start to the length of the string, assuming that this string is within the bounds of the buffer.

      Creates a new Region from the given start position, determining the end Location from the width and height.
